title: Kha'Zix is Happy.
body:
Preseason patch looking good for me, my friends. 

All them shiny CDR items and a 12% spell vamp. Mmph.

replies.body:
Tiamat having no waveclear, and being nerfed.
Mana pots removed.
Last Whisper nerfed against carry targets.

I don't know man, seems bad for my {{champion:91}}

Nah. See, you don't use that item anymore. What you do is you stacking the early CDR items like Youmuu's and Death's dance, though with Talon, you could actually rush an Essence Reaver and an Infinity Edge. I know it sounds crazy, but those Q crits plus with the Deathfire's keystone doing 50% of your total AD over 3 each time you hit some one with physical damage and your bleed proc'ing 25% over 1.5s each time it ticks? Talon might be happy. He'll be sad about his waveclear, but late game, he's going to grab up that Trinity, IE, Essence, and the new LW, Lord Dominik's Regards, and he'll be doing some insane burst while having 30% CDR from just the Essence alone. Throw in a Youmuu's or Death's Dance for the last 10% and you'll be one happy Assassin.

Especially Death's Dance. Who needs 12% LS when you can heal for 12% off of your Q and AA's and about 4% of your R and W?

Also crt chance isn't that good on Talon if you don't get 100% of it. If you can't kill your target with 1 q, 1 aa, w and r then you're prob dead.
